website_summaries.verdict: It's impressive that this harness significantly reduces the chance of back pain when toting binoculars for extended periods of time.
pros: Design keeps back pain at bay, even when worn for extended periods
Easy to attach and detach from binoculars and to put on
Made of lightweight and breathable material, perfect for any weather
Has enough length to fit comfortably over a jacket in most cases
cons: Takes some trial and error to adjust strap to perfect length for each individual’s body

customer_reviews.title: Slick... well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I really like how the brace spreads support across the back. I had these on and off many times over a long weekend of hunting and never had issues with getting the back to lay flat. A few of my buddies, with a more traditional harness, ogled this simple but effective contraption.
customer_reviews.author: likesgoodthingsthatwork

customer_reviews.title: Far from an "ingenious strap"
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed with this "Amazon choice" binocular strap. The advertising is inaccurate. It arrived in a used ziploc bag that had the word "China" on it and without any other packaging or instructions. It lacks support/substance. I cannot see any difference between this harness and the strap my binoculars came with.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Works with binoculars that have small place to connect
customer_reviews.text: I love this harness. It is very comfortable, and is the only one I could find that had a way to connect to my Eagle binoculars, which have a small hole to connect straps to. I had been using zip-ties, and they both looked geeky and broke from time to time. So this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Connie McNeill

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Nearly identical tot he Bushnell version of this, which is a good thing. I only wish the strap that secures to binos was a little longer to allow to secure the lens caps without it being so tight. Of course that depends on what style of binos you mount these too... Overall, great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor J. Smart

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: This harness worked out really great! Took a trip that involved a lot of binocular use, and this harness made it so easy to carry binocs without the neck strain and have them handy at a moments notice. Very comfortable. I put key rings on the binocs and found it very easy to attach/detach. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shadow

customer_reviews.title: Buckles won't hold straps
customer_reviews.text: Poorly designed buckles won't hold the elastic straps without slipping. You start out with your binoculars in the perfect position. Within 10 minutes they buckles slip and the binoculars are hanging down to your crotch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy on the neck!
customer_reviews.text: no more neck strain carrying my camera! So comfortable. I would have preferred rigid straps with a bit of elastic instead of totally elastic but that's easily repaired. very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Diane C Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for a great harness!
customer_reviews.text: I have some (to me) heavy binoculars and didn't want to have neck and back strain from a normal strap. This is adjustable and I don't even notice the feel of my binoculars with this on. Thanks for a great harness!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Sore Neck for Me!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to hold my large binoculars at my grandson's safari themed 1st birthday party. Knew I wouldn't be comfortable with them just hanging around my neck. With this I had them on the entire party.... no problem! Just call me Grammy the safari guide!!!
customer_reviews.author: katrina

customer_reviews.title: Returned these straps
customer_reviews.text: The straps seemed to be designed with a twist in them that made them uncomfortable to wear. The patch on the back seemed heavier that mn it needed to be.
customer_reviews.author: Phipfaye

customer_reviews.title: clips too stiff to work easily
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this harness, and I tried and tried to attach it to my binocs. After a while I managed to thread the lanyard into the binoc slot. But the clips on this are so stiff that I couldn't work them easily. I can't imagine myself getting in and out of this outside . . . too hard.
customer_reviews.author: JLC

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price, but not quick clip attach / detach
customer_reviews.text: The elastic harness is good for fitting - without constant readjusting - over layers of clothing when outdoors. I used them on a trip when I was wearing a heavy parka one minute, then shedding down to a fleece. BUT, this harness attaches to the binoculars with a little belt feature and then has a clip for "quick" detaching the binoculars, not a pinch insert as I recall was shown in the photo when I made my purchase. Good for the money, but this harness may be relegated to the kids when I find a more professional product.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh D.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and ease of use
customer_reviews.text: I love my harness, my husband and I are avid birders but this year having binoculars hanging around my neck stopped me from wanting to get out and do my favorite thing. My harness cured me I have been back out 4 days a week again. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Vick

customer_reviews.title: Received with frayed edge
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a gift, but the edge was frayed so I returned it. Not sure how a frayed edge got through Quality Control. Two stars because it otherwise was as expected and fit fine. The embroidery was nice touch, better than the screen-printed brand I bought to replace this one.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Your binoculars are where you want them to be at all times
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to put on and off compared to a ton of other types we've seen people struggle with.
customer_reviews.author: R. Pullan

customer_reviews.title: Great harness for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Best for the price. Great for the typical binocular but heavier binoculars may hang low due to very stretchy straps. Does not work well with my 15x70mm but works great witb my 10 x 40.
customer_reviews.author: Chico

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable - worked great with both my binoculars and my ...
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable - worked great with both my binoculars and my big 35 mm camera - much more comfortable than the neck harness.
customer_reviews.author: Newportmom

customer_reviews.title: Can't Share
customer_reviews.text: Your neck will thank you. Remember that you won't be able to easily hand the binoculars to another person. You may need to buy your spouse their own set! Product quality seems top notch.
customer_reviews.author: RV Traveller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product but probably works better for a man or ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product but probably works better for a man or a female who has a smaller chest. It is comfortable and easy to wear, the chest straps just didnt stay in place for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Gentzler

customer_reviews.title: Works well and good value
customer_reviews.text: We just got a new pair of good binoculars for birding, but the heavier weight was uncomfortable on our necks. This places the whole weight around your shoulders and the binoculars hang just above your belt. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lesser

customer_reviews.title: Adjustment on your body is important to start.
customer_reviews.text: First' I thought the sliding connectors on each side was strange, but the more I used it the better I liked it. When I would put my binoculars down, they would drop down to the point of my waist, but when I picked them up to used, they slid up smoothly, adjusting the strap was my problem, once I corrected the way it fit, it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MrValdo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Completely got rid of all the neck pain from the strap that came with the binoculars.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, secure
customer_reviews.text: I got it to use with a Nikon P900 for mostly nature photography. I attached a Keyhole camera harness in the front and it supports the weight of the big camera just fine. A typical day is a 2-3 hour hike in the desert. The combination of this harness and the keyhole means I no longer have a heavy camera swinging back and forth around my neck. Fits comfortably with no hot spots even after several hours on the trail.
customer_reviews.author: pencilpusherTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Very good binocular harness
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to use and one doesn’t fight all the straps on other models. It is night to be able to remove the binoculars so easily. They seem to be prett6 well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Straps are too stretchy
customer_reviews.text: The harness itself, is comfortable, but I found that the straps were too stretchy, especially after I attached my binoculars. I ended up buying some new connector straps, to help stabilize the straps a bit, so in the end.... I paid more for this harness than I was anticipating.
customer_reviews.author: David Clarke

customer_reviews.title: light weight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: have been using for hunting this fall very comfortable and holds my binoculars well
customer_reviews.author: hunter 58

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Received in two days. Really easy to use. Kind of light weight and straps are too stretchy for anything heavy..like my camera. Works great with my binoculars but doesn't support my camera. I am happy with product. Also comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.author: Jan Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great scope so far
customer_reviews.text: Great scope so far. Very easy to sight in and hopefully very durable everything seems to be of good quality and very user-friendly.
customer_reviews.author: John Mueller

customer_reviews.title: as advertised
customer_reviews.text: fit well, easy to use, performed as expected. Makes bird watching with binoculars easier and less tiring.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, easy to wear--makes having the binoculars on extremely ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, easy to wear--makes having the binoculars on extremely comfortable as opposed to uncomfortable with the traditional straps. Only complaint is that the clips provided don't appear to fit anything useful. We had to rig two cables to clip the harness to. That said-an excellent choice!
customer_reviews.author: Boyzdad3

customer_reviews.title: great - just like Bushnell harness
customer_reviews.text: got 2 of these to go with binoculars for hunting for my 2 sons. great product - just like BUSHNELL harness - at a much better price!
customer_reviews.author: Russell R. Herman

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Tried a friend’s pair and didn’t realize how nice something like this is to have in your hunting gear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Would like to see the clasp be narrower. Feel free to contact me if my suggestion is unclear.
customer_reviews.author: RossH

customer_reviews.title: Comfort plus makes this harness a winner
customer_reviews.text: Eyeskey Binocular harness strap that I purchased for a friend was highly appreciated on a recent birding trip. Comfortable to the max and made hiking and siting a breeze. It was such a hit that I came home an ordered another for myself. Seems very airy and weightless. Heartily recommend. Thanks for an excellent product at a fine price.
customer_reviews.author: SandyB

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: My binoculars are no longer a pain in the neck! The harness is easy to use, comfortable and adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: happy wife

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put on and easy to adjust. I'm sure I will be using on my next hunt.
customer_reviews.author: CAL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this was for my wife and it fit her great and very light
customer_reviews.author: michael k.

customer_reviews.title: Binocular harness
customer_reviews.text: Once you get use to getting these on you are set !! My binoculars are fairly heavy, I don't even know they are on !! I tried several harnesses and this was the best for me by far !!
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis F.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Buy this. Comfortable and keeps the glasses in perfect resting placement.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great item, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this binocular halter, fits great and really protects my neck from strain.
customer_reviews.author: Albert H.

customer_reviews.title: Has a great fit equipment easily to use and it's available at ...
customer_reviews.text: Has a great fit equipment easily to use and it's available at an awesome price I looked at plenty of plenty of others and none has fit as well as this does.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Groves

customer_reviews.title: I love it as it is light and with the wider ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it as it is light and with the wider back it is very comfortable to wear - no aching neck or back..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, no pulling on neck
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, no pulling on neck, binoculars don't bounce as you walk. This is a second one for my other binos.
customer_reviews.author: B. Granek

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very competitive price and fast shipping. Purchased as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: GREAT value for the money.... you'll Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Feels great, looks fabulous, and functions beautifully! What more can one ask for... REALLY? 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: F W Logan

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It keeps my bonocs from bump, bump, bumping my stomach and chest, and doesn't make my neck tired.
customer_reviews.author: Steggie

customer_reviews.title: Nice harness and price
customer_reviews.text: Nice harness and price, and comfortable to wear. I am adding clips and eyelets to the binocs to allow me to switch back and forth to a shoulder strap if desired.
customer_reviews.author: BILOZ

customer_reviews.title: Better than all straps
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit with my heavy camera. Much easier on & off than my previous harness that was all straps
customer_reviews.author: Franklin L. Grabowski

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: 3rd try at getting a sling that works for me
customer_reviews.author: Julie A. Crozier

customer_reviews.title: excellent & personalized follow up
customer_reviews.text: quick delivery, excellent & personalized follow up, & good price
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Winsberg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s awesome good deal too worth it for any biologist or bird lover
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. If straps were wider it would be more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dale M.

customer_reviews.title: great comfort
customer_reviews.text: spreads weight over back and not just the neck area, I am small and this adjusted nicely
customer_reviews.author: Carol A.

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says. However, it rides up in the back and presses against my neck. Can't seem to make any adjustments to stop that. Not a huge problem, just somewhat annoying. Concerned the elastic straps might not last very long and will sag in a year or two. But for the price, it isn't a huge issue. The rear "plate"breathes enough, so I remain as cool as possible on hot days.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Main

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's very comfortable and easy to get off and on.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: These are by far the best. They fit well
customer_reviews.text: We have several harness straps for cameras and binoculars. These are by far the best. They fit well, are very sturdy and hold the camera/binoculars closer with less movement then the ones with smaller supports on the back.
customer_reviews.author: mathsj

customer_reviews.title: Handy Binocular Holder
customer_reviews.text: Well designed and perfect for the binoculars I bought it for, 10 x 50s and 12 x 36s. Depending on your usage, it might suit your purposes quite well.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Great product, It is a little difficult to get it fit flat against your back.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given 5 stars, but the back support doesn't fit flat. It can fit smooth across your back if you have someone to help you.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Smith

customer_reviews.title: I really like this harness
customer_reviews.text: I really like this harness. I holds the glasses in a good position, it's light and easy to get on and off. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stein

customer_reviews.title: Average harness
customer_reviews.text: Another attempt at a comfortable harness but as one who carries both binos and camera, I prefer the HEAD harness. I will use this for summer forays.
customer_reviews.author: john gregoire

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This harness is so awesome. Takes the weight off my back and shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fits good, hooked the binoculars with the straps they came with it and I was ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick ball

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I finally have a solution to hiking with binoculers! Simple and effective and confortable. I couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hays

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and ease
customer_reviews.text: Excellent soft and easy to don on...a must by if you want comfort!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Description
customer_reviews.text: The description clearly states "Eyeskey Binoculars Harness Strap - Great for Binoculars, Cameras and Rangefinders Eyeskey Eyeskey 10x42 High Powered Magnification Binoculars - Bright and Clear Range of View - for Travel Bird Watching, Astronomy, Sports and Wildlife - Comes with Case, Lens Caps, Strap" All I received was the strap
customer_reviews.author: Prof

product_meta.title: Eyeskey Binoculars Harness Light-Weight Breathable Comfortable Binocular Strap Harness -Easy to Attach and Detach Binoculars, Cameras and Rangefinders, 4oz
feature_bullets: This harness with its ingenious strap keeps your binoculars and rangefinders, even cameras, from jostling around as you walk, freeing up the use of your hands.
Made from nylon straps which are durable and allow for easy sliding of binoculars into viewing position
Spreads the weight of your binoculars across your shoulders for more relaxed viewing, making this the most comfortable way to carry your binoculars for hours
This binoculars harness also helps keep your binoculars close to your chest and out of the way
Unique self-adjustable design can not only add comfort, but also offer large adjustment range to fit any requirements you desire

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars120 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
